# tcp_load
tcp load testing

```sh
./server.sh 127.0.0.1 8888
./client.sh 1 127.0.0.1 127.0.0.1 8888

# wks014
./server.sh 192.168.2.42 8888

# wks010
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.34 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.35 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.36 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.37 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.38 192.168.2.42 8888

# wks011
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.30 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.31 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.32 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.33 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.39 192.168.2.42 8888

# wks012 (TBD)
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.26 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.27 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.28 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.29 192.168.2.42 8888
./client.sh 20000 192.168.2.40 192.168.2.42 8888
```

```erlang
tcp_load:stop().
tcp_load:start().

length(supervisor:which_children(tcp_load)).
```
